Name: lil' Sherman
About the game: lil' Sherman is a 3rd person action tower defense RPG that takes place in a stylized WW2/Alt-Universe. The year is 1945 and with the help of Element 115 the evil Nazi Scourge has won the great war in Europe. However, with lilâ€™ Sherman leading the counteroffensive all hope is not lost. This elite U.S. Sherman tank, along with the support of the command center, will help take back Europe one country at a time. Key Features: Customize your weapons, armor and engine to destroy your enemies in whatever ways you see fit! Collect resources and use them to build your tank into the ultimate tool of destruction! 6 automated defenses to choose from, including the Tesla Tower! 4 unique maps of Switzerland . Endless mode to push your PC to the limits!
